articles.title: India ban has shamed Liberals, but not enough for many to speak out against it - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: The decision to make it a criminal offence for Australians to try to return home from India has shamed Coalition MPs, but they fear speaking out against it.
articles.content: Mostly, the fights have been down partisan lines. Blue team thinks the red team has overreached. Red team thinks the blue team is careless. Those who have put their families health and wellbeing firs… [+9221 chars]

articles.title: The internet could be 'decentralised' within two to three years - Sky News Australia
articles.description:
PAC Protocol CEO David Gokhshtein told Sky News it will only take two to three years for a “decentralised” version of the internet to take over and those who don’t adapt “will be left out”.

articles.author: Carrie Fellner, Nigel Gladstone
articles.title: Australian man dies in COVID-ravaged India as country’s death toll soars - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: A Sydney woman said her father died from COVID-19 in India after being “abandoned” by the Australian government.
articles.content: Now all I have left is my mother, who has been abandoned by her own government in India, white [sic] no way to come back to her children. We all want to cry our hearts out, but we are saving them for… [+2571 chars]

articles.description: NASA's Perseverance rover has for the first time captured the low-pitched whirring of the Ingenuity helicopter's blades as it flies through the rarefied Martian atmosphere.
